original_title: Dalla ciliegia al lambrusco (La camminata popolare di Vignola)
overview: A reportage on the “popular walk of Vignola”, a non-competitive and popular race that challenged the rhetoric of competition and the myth of sport as discipline. The joyful interviews to the participants portray an Italy looking for a sense of community and deep social connection.
title: Dalla ciliegia al lambrusco (La camminata popolare di Vignola)
